value.title: AI/ML at scale: The next horizon for PPG’s data strategy

value.title: Text autocompletion systems aim to ease our lives, but there are risks

value.title: Why Microsoft Surged by 51.2% in 2021
value.excerpt: Shares of Microsoft (NASDAQ:MSFT) surged by 51.2% in 2021, according to data provided by S&P Global Market Intelligence. For context, the Nasdaq Composite index gained 22.2% last year, so Microsoft's gain was more than double that of the technology-heavy index.
